newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Bofors wins 200 mln Skr Austrian order.
newsitem.headline: Bofors wins 200 mln Skr Austrian order.

text.p: Bofors AB, a unit of Swedish defence group Celsius AB, won an order worth 200 million crowns ($27.7 million) from the Austrian army for the night sight for the BILL anti-tank missile system.
"The first procurement of the BILL was made in 1989. Since then several orders have been placed and more are planned for the future," the company said in a release.
-- Birgitta Forsberg, Stockholm newsroom +46-8-700 1006 ($ = 7.226 Swedish Crowns)
